title: Ali: Still the Greatest PDTV x264-MVGroup
description:
ITV Ali: Still the Greatest PDTV x264-MVGroup.mkv

Desmond Lynam and Barry McGuigan look back at some of the late Muhammad Ali's greatest fights.

1. I Shook up the World
It begins with two controversial fights with Sonny Liston when the young 22-year-old Ali won his first world heavyweight title.

2. Ali versus Britain
Ali had six fights with British opposition and this programme looks at two of them against Henry Cooper and Joe Bugner.

3. The Rumble in the Jungle
In 1974 he regained his World Heavyweight crown against George Foreman in Kinshasa.

4. The Thriller in Manila
What many believe was one of the greatest heavyweight fights of all time - the third meeting between Ali and Joe Frazier in 1975 known as The Thriller in Manila.

5. Champion of the World Again
They look at Ali's world title fight against Ken Norton, and his attempt to regain the title for the third time at the age of 36 against Leon Spinks.
